Package com.intellij.codeInspection.ex

Interface UnfairLocalInspectionTool

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExternalAnnotatorBatchInspection, PairedUnfairLocalInspectionTool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckXmlFileWithXercesValidatorInspection, GroovyAccessibilityInspection, GroovyUnusedDeclarationInspection, IncompletePropertyInspection, PyPep8Inspection, ShShellcheckInspection, UnusedSymbolLocalInspection, UnusedSymbolLocalInspectionBase, XmlDuplicatedIdInspection, XmlInvalidIdInspection

    public interface UnfairLocalInspectionTool
    If for some performance reasons (e.g. one heavy analysis can be reused among different inspections), highlighting is done in a separate pass/visitor, inspections, which store highlighting settings, are supposed to be marked as UnfairLocalInspectionTool. Such inspections would provide no Fix All intention, they won't run in batch until they implement PairedUnfairLocalInspectionTool, would be ignored by CleanupIntention.
